about_the_game:
MIND MELTING CHIPTUNE SOUNDTRACK! Enjoy the driving retro beats of an original soundtrack by chiptunist Shawn Daley.

Track List
  • Track 1 - Title Theme
  • Track 2 - Main Theme
  • Track 3 - Intermission
  • Track 4 - Showdown
  • Track 5 - Second Wind
  • Track 6 - Second Intermission
  • Track 7 - Keep Skating
  • Track 8 - Low On Time
  • Track 9 - Line Brawl
  • Track 10 - Goal
  • Track 11 - Victory
  • Track 12 - Impending Doom
  • Track 13 - Bonus: Game Over
